0: I'm finna get on this TV and put shit down
1: I ain't finna let these light skinned niggas come back in style
2: I'm finna turn to this class clown shit to crazy g's
3: They told my Momma I was bipolar had A.D.D
4: I told 'em w-what I wanna do: I wanna be a baller
6: Hatin' on you to they mans on the
8: Old folks said he'd never make it off the corner
9: They are the virus that corrupts the soul
10: They are the cubic zirconia inside the 10 karat gold
11: That get green on you, when you get green on 'em
12: You gotta wash your hands of 'em, get clean on 'em
13: Somebody told success is the best revenge
14: So they going to be fucked up when you do ya thing on 'em
15: Now hold your plaques high, like who would've thought
16: And tell em *ahem ahem ahem*, thank you for your no support
17: Now how you going to talk about the way I spend my money
18: Everybody say it with me now: it's my money
19: And they know they hating; but what they don't know is
20: They are my motivation, they are my inspiration
21: Cause we the leaders, and they the followers
22: And we the nut busters, and they the swallowers
23: They are the rumors, they are the lies
24: We are the shit dog, and they the flies
25: How you going to tell me how to live my life
26: And you can't even get your own shit tight, right
27: They are the misery that loves company
28: Cause that comfortable corporate job can't comfort me
29: Told em I finished school, then I started my own business
31: Nah I decided I was finished
32: Chasin yall dreams and what you got planned
33: Now I spit it so hot you got tanned
34: And they hate on your relationship, then break your marriage up
35: Can't kill your dreams so they assassinate your character
36: Do anything to downplay ya or embarrass ya
37: Come around with ya but they ain't down with ya
39: And I'm through spitting these rappers my most heartfelt flow
40: They be like "That's cool, you got some beats for me though?"
41: Oh I get it, you want to be Snoop and Dr. Dre
42: But don't nobody give a fuck what you got to say
43: Anyway what you finna rap about?
44: You never sold crack out ya house or put a gat to a mouth
45: Or put ya fist to ya spouse, so how you going to move the crowd?
46: I bet a thousand that you get booed out
47: I even heard that they even taking wagers in jail
48: They bet ten boxes of cigarettes that I'm finna fail
49: Second you talk about peace, they going to be like: "Peace"
50: This nigga came from the Chi, moved to the east
51: You got to kill at least one person at least
52: Or we'll evict you from the rap game, cancel your lease
53: How you go to New York, what you ain't never took a tour there?
54: What you ain't know you gotta be rich just to be poor there?
title: Gossip Files
